p:
Plant materials were extracted twice with boiling water with a material:solvent ratio ( m/ v) as follows: 1:16 and 1:10. Obtained infusions were immediately filtered and freeze-dried
33 . Ethanolic extracts were obtained by sonication (for 15 min) using 70% ethanol at room temperature. The extraction was repeated twice. The organic solvent was evaporated under the vacuum at 40 °C. The water residue was freeze-dried. Dry extracts were dissolved in mixture of DMSO:water (v/v, 1:1) to prepare 20 mg/mL stock solution.
